Package com.islandpower.configurator.model.project

Class ConfigurationModel

java.lang.Object
com.islandpower.configurator.model.project.ConfigurationModel
public class ConfigurationModel extends Object
Model representing the configuration of a project. This class aggregates various project-related components, such as appliances, system voltage, and selected hardware (inverter, battery, solar panel, and controller).
